thread.title: Natalie

author: Natalie
title: Natalie
text:
Great service!
Competitive online booking, hassle free.
Jon replaced my tyres in around 20 minutes. I've booked in for tyres online in the past and had to take time out of a busy schedule to go and wait up to an hour for a space in the garage and once on the ramps watch whilst they juggle between jobs.
Tyres on the Drive came to my work place and did it all in no time without me having to do anything other than book and pay. Friendly service and well recommended as they went above and beyond to accommodate my needs.
Admittedly they can't do tracking and alignment but I needed tyres on spot. So providing your confident with your setup TOTD are perfect.
Thanks TOTD
